Posts.Content: Hi I wonder if anyone has been in my situation. I had a 5cm tumour and spread to lymph nodes (5) I have just finished 6 rounds of FECT. My last MRI has shown the tumour has disappeared however the cancer is still in my nodes. I am gutted and terrified. I have a lumpectomy and full node removal in 3 weeks then 29 days of radiotherapy. I’m now wishing I had the op first then the chemo. I’m terrified that this will spread an feel that because it’s being cut out with no follow up treatment (like cheno) I’m now a higher risk. Any help would be greatly appreciated my minds doind overtime. Thanks.
